title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 850.17 - Fees of the clerk of the court
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 850.17 - Fees of the clerk of the court

State Regulations
(a) Fees. In addition to the fees provided for in section
1250.17
of this Title, pursuant to

Judiciary Law section 265, the clerk of the court is entitled to receive for
and on behalf of the State: (1)

For a
large, embossed certificate attesting to admission as an attorney and counselor
at law, $25. (2)

For a printed
certificate attesting to admission, good standing and registration as an
attorney and counselor at law, $10. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
850.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
